Html: New mage user here. Love the program, still figuring out how to tweak things correctly. Was hoping someone could confirm, looks to me that the ember skyfire diamond is giving +2 int, instead of +2%. thanks!
Looks right to me.. 18int + 14dmg is about 25dps for me, which is what it says. If it were only calculating as 2int + 14dmg, it'd be alot less, like 10dps.

ok on my toon ive got the 12 spell dam + run speed meta in the destruction holo goggles and its calling that 71.79 dps
if i swap out that meta for the ember skyfire it ups it to 74.19 dps...i dont doubt im missing something, but im not seeing it

also with the first gem rawr shows me 654 int, with the ember skyfire it displays 657

Do you perhaps have a different gem in the other gem slot on those 2 helms? Or you don't have the gem colors required to meet one/both of the metas? Try looking at the chart for just metas. When I equip the ember metagem with no other changes, it goes from 902int to 920int (902 * 1.02 = 920.04), so looks correct here.

double checked and i have same gem in second slot each time, and i do meet reqs for metas...

but i think maybe i found it...looking at the gem itself, edit, the scroll window on the right side; under base stats: int = 2, and spell combat ratings: damage = 14

if im reading this correctly base stats: int should = 0 and misc: %int should = 2

sound accurate?

well ok lets make that 0.02 :P
Ah hah, found your issue. It's defined as 2% in the default item cache, but you must have refreshed data on it, and the armory parser for that gem screws to up. Kavan can you fix that?
thanks much for the help, and all the work on the program :)
